sentences.sContent: For familial reputation, the old madam of wooden elegant you home paid the silversmith Li Yinshan that comes from Chinese ground Kangzhutuo in the dark.
sentences.sContent_eng: For familial reputation, the old madam of wooden elegant you home paid the silversmith Li Yinshan that comes from Chinese ground Kangzhutuo in the dark.
sentences.sCn: 为了家族的名誉，木雅府上的老夫人暗中把康珠托付给了从汉地来的银匠李银山。

words.tran: 银的；含银的；有银色光泽的；口才流利的；第二十五周年的婚姻
银；银器；银币；银质奖章；餐具；银灰色

trans.tranOther: someone who makes jewellery and other things out of silver
